definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: in Assyr. (Bab.) (van d. H. ´[[שׁ]]:, but v. Baer, and Str:ZMG xxxiii (1879), 302; in As. perhaps [Ašur, Bêl, or Nergal] šar-uṣur, [...] protect the king ! COT:2Ki 19:37; Sarasa(r));—
son of Sennach., 2Ki 19:37 = Is 37:38 (Schr:COT l. c. WKl:KAT 3, 84 Stevenson:Hast. DB. iv. 476).
a returned exile Zec 7:2 (Stevenson:ib. 477).—Cf. also ´[[נֵרְגַּל שׂ]]: p. 669.
